comments.html:
Ivan.
Now I hope that you and your family enjoy rest of vacation on Brač. Without any more disasters and fire (except maybe below some nice peace of fish).
comments.name: Ratko

comments.html: we are going to Brač at the end of August... hope that situation settle down by then :)
comments.name: Jan Zorz

comments.html: We were planning to go home a day later anyway. The grilled fish was even better than the one I had in Starigrad a few years back ;)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
